description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手、词曲作家、演员及制作人，对华语乐坛产生重大影响，有“华语流行天王”之美誉。
description.en: Taiwanese singer, songwriter, actor, and producer who has had a significant impact on the Mandopop music scene and is known as the 'King of Mandopop'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女艺人，周杰伦的妻子。
description.en: Taiwanese artist and wife of Jay Chou.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦的父亲，曾任教于新北市立芦洲国民中学。
description.en: Jay Chou's father, a former biology teacher at Luzhou Junior High School.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦的母亲，曾是林口国中美术老师。
description.en: Jay Chou's mother, a former art teacher at Linkou Junior High School.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男艺人、主持人，发掘周杰伦进入乐坛。
description.en: Taiwanese male artist and host who discovered Jay Chou and brought him into the music industry.

description.zh-cn: 音乐人，阿尔发音乐前总监，与周杰伦、方文山共同创办杰威尔音乐。
description.en: Musician, former general manager of Alfa Music, and co-founder of JVR Music with Jay Chou and Vincent Fang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾词作家，周杰伦的长期音乐合作伙伴及杰威尔音乐的共同创办人。
description.en: Taiwanese lyricist, Jay Chou's long-term musical partner, and co-founder of JVR Music.

description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手、演员，“四大天王”之一。
description.en: Hong Kong singer and actor, one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese female singer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾乐团五月天的主唱。
description.en: Lead vocalist of the Taiwanese band Mayday.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾新闻主播、艺人。
description.en: Taiwanese news anchor and artist.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女歌手。
description.en: Taiwanese female singer.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男艺人，周杰伦的好友。
description.en: Taiwanese male artist and a close friend of Jay Chou.

nodes.id: 新北市私立淡江高级中学

zh-cn: 新北市私立淡江高级中学

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市淡水区的私立高级中学，为周杰伦的母校。
description.en: A private high school in Tamsui District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, and Jay Chou's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 台湾唱片公司，由吴宗宪创立，是周杰伦出道的公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese record label founded by Jacky Wu, where Jay Chou started his career.

description.zh-cn: 由周杰伦、方文山、杨峻荣共同创办的唱片和经纪公司。
description.en: A record label and management company co-founded by Jay Chou, Vincent Fang, and Yang Jun-rong.

description.zh-cn: 一支台湾的电子竞技职业队伍，前身为台北暗杀星（TPA），后由周杰伦取得经营权并更名。
description.en: A Taiwanese professional esports team, formerly known as Taipei Assassins (TPA), which was acquired and renamed by Jay Chou.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Jay Chou.

description.zh-cn: 张学友的音乐专辑，对周杰伦早期的音乐生涯产生了重要影响。
description.en: A music album by Jacky Cheung that had a significant influence on Jay Chou's early music career.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦创作并卖出的第一首歌曲，由江蕙演唱，也是他与方文山首次合作的知名作品。
description.en: The first song composed and sold by Jay Chou, performed by Jody Chiang. It is also his first well-known collaboration with Vincent Fang.

description.zh-cn: 一部2005年的电影，是周杰伦参演的首部电影，他饰演主角藤原拓海。
description.en: A 2005 film that marked Jay Chou's acting debut, in which he played the lead role of Takumi Fujiwara.

description.zh-cn: 一部2006年的电影，周杰伦在其中饰演二王子元杰。
description.en: A 2006 film in which Jay Chou played the role of Prince Yuan Jie.

description.zh-cn: 一部2007年的电影，是周杰伦第一部自编自导自演的作品。
description.en: A 2007 film which was Jay Chou's directorial debut, which he also wrote and starred in.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与昆凌于2014年登记结婚，并于2015年1月在英国举行婚礼。
description.en: Jay Chou and Hannah Quinlivan registered their marriage in 2014 and held their wedding ceremony in the UK in January 2015.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦是周耀中的儿子。
description.en: Jay Chou is the son of Zhou Yaozhong.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦是叶惠美的儿子。
description.en: Jay Chou is the son of Ye Huimei.

relationships.target: 新北市私立淡江高级中学

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦高中就读于淡江中学音乐科，主修钢琴。
description.en: Jay Chou attended Tamkang High School as a music major, focusing on piano.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦出生于台湾台北县林口乡（现新北市林口区）。
description.en: Jay Chou was born in Linkou Township, Taipei County, Taiwan (now Linkou District, New Taipei City).

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦曾表示，张学友的专辑《吻别》影响了他，使他开始喜欢并专注于流行音乐。
description.en: Jay Chou stated that Jacky Cheung's album 'The Goodbye Kiss' influenced him to start liking and focusing on pop music.

description.zh-cn: 吴宗宪在选秀节目中发现了周杰伦的才华，并与其签约，发掘他进入乐坛。
description.en: Jacky Wu discovered Jay Chou's talent at a talent show, signed him, and launched his career in the music industry.

description.zh-cn: 时任阿尔发音乐总监的杨峻荣在听到周杰伦的作品后大为赞赏，并积极帮助他推出了首张个人专辑。
description.en: As the general manager of Alfa Music, Yang Jun-rong greatly admired Jay Chou's work after hearing it and actively helped him release his debut solo album.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦出道初期签约于吴宗宪的阿尔发音乐公司，直到2007年成立自己的公司杰威尔音乐。
description.en: Jay Chou was signed to Jacky Wu's Alfa Music in his early career until he founded his own company, JVR Music, in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与方文山是长期的音乐合作伙伴，自1999年起共同创作了大量知名作品。
description.en: Jay Chou and Vincent Fang are long-term musical partners who have co-created numerous famous works since 1999.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦创作了歌曲《落雨声》，这是他第一首卖出的歌曲。
description.en: Jay Chou composed the song 'Sound of Falling Rain', which was the first song he sold.

description.zh-cn: 江蕙演唱了由周杰伦和方文山创作的歌曲《落雨声》。
description.en: Jody Chiang performed the song 'Sound of Falling Rain', written by Jay Chou and Vincent Fang.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与方文山、杨峻荣于2007年4月共同创办了杰威尔音乐有限公司。
description.en: Jay Chou, along with Vincent Fang and Yang Jun-rong, co-founded JVR Music Ltd. in April 2007.

description.zh-cn: 方文山与周杰伦、杨峻荣于2007年4月共同创办了杰威尔音乐有限公司。
description.en: Vincent Fang, along with Jay Chou and Yang Jun-rong, co-founded JVR Music Ltd. in April 2007.

description.zh-cn: 杨峻荣与周杰伦、方文山于2007年4月共同创办了杰威尔音乐有限公司。
description.en: Yang Jun-rong, along with Jay Chou and Vincent Fang, co-founded JVR Music Ltd. in April 2007.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦邀请费玉清在歌曲《千里之外》中合唱。
description.en: Jay Chou invited Fei Yu-ching to feature on the song 'Faraway'.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与五月天主唱阿信（陈信宏）合作演唱了单曲《说好不哭》。
description.en: Jay Chou collaborated with Mayday's lead singer Ashin (Chen Shin-hung) on the single 'Won't Cry'.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与派伟俊合作歌曲《Six Degrees》，并共同填词。
description.en: Jay Chou collaborated with Patrick Brasca on the song 'Six Degrees', and they co-wrote the lyrics.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦在电影《头文字D》中担任男主角，并为其创作了歌曲《飘移》和《一路向北》。
description.en: Jay Chou starred in the film 'Initial D' and composed the songs 'Drifting' and 'All the Way North' for it.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦在电影《满城尽带黄金甲》中饰演元杰王子，并为其创作了歌曲《黄金甲》和《菊花台》。
description.en: Jay Chou played Prince Yuan Jie in the film 'Curse of the Golden Flower' and composed the songs 'Golden Armor' and 'Chrysanthemum Terrace' for it.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦自编自导自演了电影《不能说的·秘密》，并创作了其中的大部分音乐。
description.en: Jay Chou wrote, directed, and starred in the film 'Secret', and also composed most of its music.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，周杰伦与侯佩岑同游东京被媒体拍到，随后周杰伦承认了这段恋情。
description.en: In 2005, Jay Chou and Patty Hou were photographed together in Tokyo by the media, after which Chou confirmed their relationship.

description.zh-cn: 自2001年起，媒体多次报道周杰伦与蔡依林的“双J恋”绯闻，但周杰伦多次公开否认。
description.en: Since 2001, the media frequently reported on the rumored 'Double J' romance between Jay Chou and Jolin Tsai, but Chou publicly denied it on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与刘畊宏是好友，并曾有商业合作。
description.en: Jay Chou and Will Liu are close friends and have had business collaborations.

description.zh-cn: 2016年，周杰伦代表的杰艺文创公司取得电竞战队“台北暗杀星”的经营权，并将其改名为“J Team”。
description.en: In 2016, Jay Chou's company, J TEAM Creative, acquired the management rights of the esports team 'Taipei Assassins' and renamed it 'J Team'.

description.zh-cn: 在取得J Team的经营权后，周杰伦担任该战队的董事长兼荣誉队长。
description.en: After acquiring J Team, Jay Chou serves as the team's Chairman and Honorary Captain.
